channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）告诉同行，她认为释放被冻结的俄罗斯资产以帮助乌克兰是 "合乎道义的"。
item.description:
Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen tells counterparts that she sees a "moral case" for freeing up frozen Russian assets to help Ukraine https://t.co/e1l8yTxNFf

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: AMC Entertainment 的股价从备忘录股票的高位回落近三年，目前正徘徊在历史最低点。
item.description:
Almost three years removed from its meme-stock heights, AMC Entertainment shares are skirting record lows https://t.co/nWlJIt56QK

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 英国陷入困境的水务公司正重返欧元债券市场，以满足其庞大的投资需求
item.description:
The UK’s embattled water companies are returning to the euro bond market to fund their massive investment needs https://t.co/tUIDMNieuN

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 贝莱德称投资者应更多依赖主动管理策略，因为 "巨力 "将利率维持在大流行前的水平之上
item.description:
BlackRock says investors should rely more on actively managed strategies as "mega forces" keep rates over pre-pandemic levels https://t.co/CE9A4Maiwf

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 电动汽车制造商 Lucid 不仅仅是沙特阿拉伯的一项金融投资，该公司首席执行官表示，沙特阿拉伯认为电动汽车制造商对其经济多样化至关重要。
item.description:
Electric-vehicle maker Lucid is more than just a financial investment to Saudi Arabia, which sees the EV maker as critical to diversifying its economy, says the firm's CEO https://t.co/g0yk6xgci5

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 劳氏公司称，由于消费者继续推迟装修房屋，今年的销售额将进一步下降
item.description:
Lowe’s says its sales will fall further this year as consumers continue to hold off from sprucing up their homes https://t.co/oeC231NsvL

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 金融稳定委员会敦促有关当局加强规则，防止货币市场基金面临流动性紧缩问题
item.description:
The Financial Stability Board is urging authorities to strengthen rules that would prevent money-market funds from facing a liquidity crunch https://t.co/OslXztLC6T

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 一位颇具影响力的英国企业家表示，政府打击移民有可能损害英国的高等教育机构，并使英国成为科技领头羊的雄心倒退。
item.description:
The government’s migration crackdown risks damaging UK higher education institutions and setting back the country’s ambitions to be a leader in science and technology, according to an influential British entrepreneur https://t.co/2VDRsdRDCe

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 美联储利率通常是在自动扶梯上上升，在电梯里下降。这一次，情况似乎恰恰相反
item.description:
Fed interest rates typically go up on the escalator and down in the elevator. This time around, it looks to be exactly the opposite https://t.co/DrWG9KtW5h

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 尽管收益率接近年内最高水平，但两年期和五年期国债的销售仅吸引了一般的需求，美国国债投资者正准备迎接另一场拍卖会的到来
item.description:
Investors in US Treasury debt are bracing for another auction, after sales of two- and five-year notes drew only middling demand — despite yields near the highest levels of the year https://t.co/xynp3LDCVY

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪宣布四名入选印度首次载人太空任务的宇航员名单
item.description:
India’s Prime Minister Narendra Modi announces the names of four astronauts selected for the country’s first crewed space mission https://t.co/3S3PaVWZvr

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 由于对哈维尔-米莱伊（Javier Milei）抑制物价上涨的计划持乐观态度，阿根廷银行告诉客户不要购买利息支付与通货膨胀挂钩的短期债券
item.description:
Banks in Argentina tell clients to ease off short-term bonds with interest payments linked to inflation amid optimism about Javier Milei’s plans to tame price increases https://t.co/smx15UCeTq

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 英国金融监管机构表示，它将更早地确定正在调查的公司，以鼓励举报人站出来并增强威慑力。
item.description:
The UK’s financial watchdog says it will identify firms it’s investigating at a much earlier stage, in an effort to encourage whistleblowers to come forward and boost deterrence https://t.co/VDBTnRUKYB

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 本周在巴西举行的 20 国集团会议上，各国财政部长在闭幕声明草案中表示，全球经济实现软着陆的可能性越来越大。
item.description:
The global economy has a growing chance of pulling off a soft landing, finance chiefs said in a draft of the G-20’s closing statement at this week’s meeting in Brazil https://t.co/z9VuwGJ6ws

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description:
Five Things You Need to Know to Start Your Day: Americas https://t.co/UaRWeGfo6B

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 蒙特利尔银行因资本市场收入疲软而未能达到分析师预期，并报告贷款损失准备金增加
item.description:
Bank of Montreal missed analysts’ estimates as it grappled with weak capital-markets revenue and reported an increase in loan-loss provisions https://t.co/QIdNmoTXfl

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 蒸馏酒生产商金巴利公布全年盈利超过分析师预期，股价最高上涨 7.5
item.description:
Shares in distiller Campari rise as much as 7.5% after it reports full-year earnings ahead of analyst estimates https://t.co/bsO65Mux71

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 美联储在 2022 年和 2023 年以四十年来最快的速度加息。现在，美联储官员正在降低降息速度的预期。
item.description:
The Fed hiked interest rates in 2022 and 2023 at the fastest pace in four decades. Now, officials are tempering expectations that cuts will come as quickly https://t.co/bEDsrHhqhR

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: Sixth Street Partners 首席执行官艾伦-瓦克斯曼（Alan Waxman）表示，在银行应对房地产投资组合压力之际，他的公司已做好资本运作的准备
item.description:
Sixth Street Partners CEO Alan Waxman says his firm is ready to capitalize as banks grapple with stress in their real estate portfolios https://t.co/EuX82DaPw7

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 南非称犀牛偷猎现象再次抬头，偷猎者的目标是东南部的夸祖鲁-纳塔尔省
item.description:
South Africa says rhino poaching is back on the rise with poachers targeting the southeastern province of KwaZulu-Natal https://t.co/J5imfSWNj5

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 丰业银行的贷款损失准备金低于分析师预期，消费者贷款压力日益增大
item.description:
Bank of Nova Scotia missed analysts’ estimates for loan-loss provisions amid growing stress in consumer lending https://t.co/fNCKDikID4

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 全球最大的气候融资联盟承诺支持巴西实现绿色经济和减少碳排放的目标
item.description:
The world’s biggest climate finance coalition has pledged to support Brazil’s ambitions to green its economy and cut carbon emissions https://t.co/fNNiFfQeMl

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 欧洲救助基金负责人表示，商业房地产目前没有危机，风险也 "没有惊人地显现"。
item.description:
There is no crisis for now in commercial real estate and risks have “not materialized spectacularly,” says the head of Europe’s rescue fund https://t.co/ssFCnzhRat

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: Box、Accel 校友为他们位于圣克拉拉的初创公司 Interview Kickstart 获得融资，该公司可帮助应对人工智能领域严重的人才短缺问题 Via @technology @business #AI
item.description:
Box, Accel alum get funding for their Santa-Clara-based startup, Interview Kickstart, that helps navigate the severe talent crunch in AI
Via @technology @business https://t.co/ao2P0ZLKxb#AI pic.twitter.com/ZGGYYaJiLs

— Saritha Rai (@SarithaRai) February 27, 2024

item.title: 根据安永公布的数据，2023 年中国投资者在欧洲收购公司的数量将达到十多年来的最低点，交易的总体价值也将下降。
item.description:
Europe saw the lowest number of company takeovers by Chinese investors in more than a decade in 2023, with the overall value of deals also falling, according to data published by EY https://t.co/L2xZA9Vvi6

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 香港最热门的新店甚至不在香港，市民们坐巴士到深圳好市多购物
item.description:
Hong Kong’s hottest new store isn’t even in Hong Kong—residents are making bus trips to Shenzhen to shop at Costco https://t.co/PXkTBIcOBr

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 泰国总检察长起诉了一名前警察局长和其他七人，指控他们在 2012 年一起致命的肇事逃逸案中帮助红牛继承人沃拉尤特-尤维德希亚（Vorayuth Yoovidhya）逃避刑事指控。
item.description:
Thailand’s attorney general has indicted a former police chief and seven others for helping Red Bull heir Vorayuth Yoovidhya evade criminal charges after a deadly hit-and-run in 2012 https://t.co/JNLEbVHTTR

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 中国任职时间最短的外交部长秦刚正式从中国最高立法机构卸任。
item.description:
China’s shortest-serving Foreign Minister Qin Gang has officially stepped down from the country’s top legislative body, months after he was removed from his position and hasn’t been seen in public since https://t.co/1cQ1KrB9RR

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: @JLeeEnergy 写道：俄罗斯摆脱了萨哈林岛 Sokol 运输暂时停止的影响，附近科兹米诺的 ESPO 流量激增，使四周出口量达到近四个月来的最高值。
item.description:
Russia shrugged off the temporary halt to Sokol shipments from Sakhalin Island with a surge in ESPO flows from nearby Kozmino, lifting four-week exports to their highest in almost four months, writes @JLeeEnergy https://t.co/k2QEk7r3yH

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024

item.title: 芬兰支付处理公司 Enfuce 在英国获得电子货币机构许可证
item.description:
A Finnish payments-processing company Enfuce gets an electronic money institution license in the UK https://t.co/2yYBEhvPrV

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 27, 2024
